Provides the caches which can be used when doing XSLT conversions. Like a cache for Templates and a cache for Factories.

There is also a cache for XSLT results.

@since MMBase-1.6 @see org.mmbase.bridge.jsp.taglib.FormatterTag The FormatterTag, which' implementation is an example use of these caches @see org.mmbase.applications.editwizard Editwizards are heavily based on XSL transformations
